definition: the attribute of having a strong offensive smell
details:
noun
- the attribute of having a strong offensive smell
= synonyms: malodorousness
- (of weather) the badness of the weather
= example: (of weather) the badness of the weather
= synonyms: raininess
- a state characterized by foul or disgusting dirt and refuse
= synonyms: nastiness
- disgusting wickedness and immorality
= example: disgusting wickedness and immorality
